keyword: how many calories is in a tamale
title: How Many Calories Are in a Tamale?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in a tamale, including macros like protein, carbs, fat, plus variations and nutrition facts for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Tamale?
assumptions: Standard corn masa tamale with pork filling, steamed; about 150 g total weight, no added sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by filling (e.g., chicken, veggie, beef), size, masa type, and preparation; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical pork tamale contains about 250 kcal and 10 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Vegetarian (cheese and bean filling instead of pork)

faqs.q: How many calories is in a tamale?
faqs.a: About 250 kcal for a standard pork tamale.
Yes, around 25 g carbs per tamale, mostly from corn masa.

faqs.q: What's the protein in one tamale?
faqs.a: Roughly 10 g, depending on the filling like pork or chicken.

faqs.q: Do tamales have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, often 500 mg or more due to seasonings and broth.

faqs.q: How do veggie tamales compare calorie-wise?
faqs.a: Typically lower, around 200 kcal, with less fat and protein.
